wg_independence.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了获得独立。
wg_independence.en_desc: War is waged to secure independence.

№拥有宣称：§H前者§!

wg_end_threat.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了消灭宇宙文明的共同威胁。
wg_end_threat.en_desc: War is waged to end a threat to galactic civilization.

wg_assimilation.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了同化目标帝国的人口。

wg_cleansing.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了将敌人从宇宙中清除出去。
wg_cleansing.en_desc: War is waged to cleanse the enemy from the face of the galaxy.

wg_absorption.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了将敌人彻底吸收消化。

wg_plunder.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了袭击和掠夺敌人。
wg_plunder.en_desc: War is waged to raid and plunder the enemy.
wg_plunder.potential_logic:

wg_colossus.zhcn_desc: 空前强大的武器，可让敌国屈服于我们的意志之下。
wg_colossus.en_desc: Immensely powerful weapons allow us to enforce our will upon our enemies.

wg_end_threat_colossus.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了结束敌人使用巨像级武器的威胁。
wg_end_threat_colossus.en_desc: War is waged to end a threat of our enemies using their Colossusa.

wg_subjugation.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了强迫敌人成为我们的附庸。\n\n若是通过“维持现状”结束战争的话，我们所占据的恒星系将会被释放为新的附庸，前提是他们被释放后必须拥有至少一个行星。
wg_subjugation.en_desc: War is waged to subjugate the enemy as a Vassal.\n\nIn the event of a Status Quo peace, systems we occupy will be released as a new Vassal if they include at least one planet.
wg_subjugation.potential_logic:
△以下条件全部为否
△有有效的国家理念：§H内圣之道§!
△有§H企业政府§!权力制度
№拥有§H灭绝战争§!的宣战借口§H否§!

▲拥有§H想要贸易§!性格

wg_force_ideology.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了将进攻者的政体和思潮强加给敌人。\n\n若是通过“维持现状”结束战争的话，我们所占据的恒星系将会被释放为新的相同意识形态盟友，前提是他们被释放后必须拥有至少一个行星。
wg_force_ideology.en_desc: War is waged to force one's ethos and government form on the enemy.\n\nIn the event of a Status Quo peace, systems we occupy will be released as a new ideological ally if they include at least one planet.

wg_conquest.zhcn_desc: 战争是为了占据我们已宣称所有权的敌人的恒星系。使用此战争目标时每个征服的恒星系会少产生§Y25%§!§Y威胁§!。
wg_conquest.en_desc: War is waged to seize Claimed enemy systems. Using this wargoal to take claims generates §Y25%§! less §YThreat§! for each conquered system.
wg_conquest.potential_logic: №拥有§H灭绝战争§!的宣战借口§H否§!

wg_humiliation.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是动摇敌人的政权及其人们对制度的信心。
wg_humiliation.en_desc: War is waged to undermine the enemy regime and the populace's faith in their institutions.
wg_humiliation.potential_logic: №拥有§H灭绝战争§!的宣战借口§H否§!

wg_take_galatron.zhcn_desc: 沐浴在银河之星的光芒之下是每一个智慧生命的权利。那些闭关锁国的文明不配成为银河之星的管理者。
wg_take_galatron.en_desc: To bathe in the glory of the Galatron is the right of all sapient beings. A civilization that would close its borders to others is not a fit steward of the Galatron.
wg_take_galatron.potential_logic: №拥有§H灭绝战争§!的宣战借口§H否§!

wg_expel_corp.zhcn_desc: 发动战争的目的是为了关闭那些大公司在我们星球上的分部并征收他们的财产。
wg_expel_corp.en_desc: War is waged to close down the corporation's branch offices and expropriate their properties on our planets.
wg_expel_corp.potential_logic: №拥有§H灭绝战争§!的宣战借口§H否§!
wg_expel_corp.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y进攻方§!每关闭一个分部便可获得£energy£  §Y1000§!。
wg_expel_corp.on_status_quo_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!每关闭一个分部便可获得£energy£  §Y1000§!。

wg_hostile_takeover.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了夺取他们分部的控制权。
wg_hostile_takeover.en_desc: War is waged to seize control of their branch offices.

wg_steal_galatron.zhcn_desc: 拥有银河之星是我国崛起之路中至高无上的目标。除非银河之星被从那些不值当的附属品中解放出来并以其永恒长存庇佑我们的国家，我们永远不会停手。
wg_steal_galatron.en_desc: Possession of the Galatron is paramount to our ascendance. We will not rest until the Galatron blesses our empire with its eternal presence, liberated from less worthy appendages.

wg_fe_humiliation.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是给崛起者一个下马威。
wg_fe_humiliation.en_desc: War is waged to teach the upstarts a lesson.
wg_fe_humiliation.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!被羞辱了，降低了§Y帝国影响力收入§!和人口幸福度，持续§Y10§!年\n§Y防御方§!被强迫撤销他们对§Y进攻方§!的所有宣称所有权

wg_fe_stop_atrocities.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了强迫敌人停止他们的暴行。
wg_fe_stop_atrocities.en_desc: War is waged to force the enemy to stop their abominable practices.
wg_fe_stop_atrocities.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!被羞辱了，降低了§Y帝国影响力收入§!和人口幸福度，持续§Y10§!年\n§Y防御方§!被强迫撤销他们对§Y进攻方§!的所有宣称所有权

№目标是失落帝国施行§Y中止暴行§!的可用目标§H是§!

wg_fe_stop_ai.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是迫使敌人放弃对人工智能天真的利用。
wg_fe_stop_ai.en_desc: War is waged to force the enemy to abandon their naive exploitation of Artificial Intelligences.
wg_fe_stop_ai.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!被羞辱了，降低了§Y帝国影响力收入§!和人口幸福度，持续§Y10§!年\n§Y防御方§!被强迫撤销他们对§Y进攻方§!的所有宣称所有权
wg_fe_stop_ai.possible_logic:

▲来自
№目标是失落帝国施行§Y人工智能非法化§!的可用目标§H是§!

wg_fe_cleanse_holy_worlds.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是将异教徒们从驱逐出圣地。
wg_fe_cleanse_holy_worlds.en_desc: War is waged to drive the heathens from sanctified soil.
wg_fe_cleanse_holy_worlds.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!被羞辱了，降低了§Y帝国影响力收入§!和人口幸福度，持续§Y10§!年\n§Y防御方§!被强迫撤销他们对§Y进攻方§!的所有宣称所有权
wg_fe_cleanse_holy_worlds.possible_logic:
▲拥有§H重视圣地§!性格
▲来自
№目标是失落帝国施行§Y净化圣地§!的可用目标§H是§!

wg_fe_cleanse_border_worlds.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了净化一切被认为离核心领土过近的敌人。
wg_fe_cleanse_border_worlds.en_desc: War is waged to eradicate any enemy presence deemed to be too close to core territories.
wg_fe_cleanse_border_worlds.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!被羞辱了，降低了§Y帝国影响力收入§!和人口幸福度，持续§Y10§!年\n§Y防御方§!被强迫撤销他们对§Y进攻方§!的所有宣称所有权
wg_fe_cleanse_border_worlds.possible_logic:
▲拥有§H需要边界缓冲区§!性格
№与§H来自§!相邻

wg_ae_domination.zhcn_desc: 这场战争将使我们成为整个河系的主宰。
wg_ae_domination.en_desc: War is waged to establish domination over the galaxy.
wg_ae_domination.potential_logic:

wg_end_threat_ae.zhcn_desc: 战争的目的是为了消灭宇宙文明的共同威胁。
wg_end_threat_ae.en_desc: War is waged to end a threat to galactic civilization.
wg_end_threat_ae.potential_logic:
▲国家类型是§H普通帝国§!
▲来自
▲国家类型是§H复兴帝国§!

wg_machine_uprising.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了推翻那些剥削我们的有机生命。
wg_machine_uprising.en_desc: War is waged to overthrow the organic oppressors.

wg_war_in_heaven.zhcn_desc: 这场战争将决定谁是星系的主宰。
wg_war_in_heaven.en_desc: War is waged to decide who will rule over the galaxy.
wg_war_in_heaven.on_accept_logic:

wg_assert_overlordship.zhcn_desc: 这场战争是为了维护我们对附属国的统治。
wg_assert_overlordship.en_desc: War is waged to assert dominance over a rebelling subject.
wg_assert_overlordship.on_accept_logic: ▲§Y防御方§!依然是§Y进攻方§!的附庸国
